name: A.L.I.V.E.
description:
You have four senses in this game, vision，auditory, sense of surrounding and sense of direction. 

These four senses would drop slowly over time, you can find different supplement in the maze to keep your senses alive, which would help you to avoid enemy and escape from the maze.

Supplement Icon                                                    Effect

             When you vision is active, your field of vision would be wider.

            You can hear the enemy when they near you.

            Sense of surrounding can perceive the position of supplement around you.

            Sense of direction would help to you to know the direction of the exit.

WASD to move around

Screen shots:

At the bottom of the UI, it shows how much energy left for each senses.

this is what would happen when no sense energy left, you can still move around but be careful.

中文说明：

在这个游戏里，你有四种感官，视觉，听觉，周围感知和方向感，

四种感官会随着时间流逝慢慢消退，需要地图中散落的补给让你的感官保持激活，同时在迷宫中，躲避敌人的巡逻，逃出迷宫。

补给符号                                                      补给作用

             视觉越激活可以让你的视野变得更广；

             听觉能让你侦测到敌人移动的声音；

             周围感知能够你感知到周围掉落的物品的位置；

             方向感则会让你知道出口所在的方向；

移动：WASD

左右视角：方向键左右

游戏截图：

在下方UI显示四种感官还剩余的能量.。

当感官没有能量之后，视角会如上图，您还可以移动，但是要小心周围。
